RadioBoxStateListener Class Reference

#include <RadioBoxStateListener.h>

Inheritance diagram for RadioBoxStateListener:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A radio box state to field activation listener is a special radio box listener that toggles the active flag of a field according to the radio box state.

See also:
Field::addRadioBoxStateListener()

Definition at line 20 of file RadioBoxStateListener.h.
